summary:
Task complete. Let me provide the summary.

## Summary

I completed the **`spot-price-view-enhanced`** task - creating a comprehensive enhanced Pörssisähkön hinta (spot price) page view.

### Files Changed:

1. **`laravel/app/Livewire/SpotPrice.php`** - Added `getChartData()` method that generates Chart.js compatible data with color-coded bars

2. **`laravel/resources/views/livewire/spot-price.blade.php`** - Completely redesigned with:
   - Hero section with current price prominently displayed
   - Price comparison cards (today vs yesterday vs weekly average with change indicators)
   - Interactive Chart.js bar chart with color-coded price levels (green/yellow/red)
   - Statistics section (average, median, min, max)
   - Best hours cards (cheapest hour, most expensive hour, price volatility)
   - Cheapest remaining hours section
   - EV charging section with optimal 3-hour window and potential savings
   - Enhanced hourly prices table with color indicators
   - Mobile-responsive design
